title: The Fiend
content:
evel 10, The Fiend earns Fiendish Resilience. This allows to choose a damage type, and become resistant to it once per short rest. This is an ideal ability to change before important battles to become resistant to the most damaging attacks or most common attacks while fighting. Notes, Tips, and other Trivia for The Fiend subclass go here.
